001package com.technototes.library.hardware;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.List;
005
006/** Interface for hardware device groups
007 * @author Alex Stedman
008 */
009@SuppressWarnings("unused")
010public interface HardwareDeviceGroup<T extends HardwareDevice> {
011    /** Get the followers for the lead device
012     *
013     * @return The followers
014     */
015    T[] getFollowers();
016
017    default List<T> getFollowerist() {
018        return Arrays.asList(getFollowers());
019    }
020    /** Get all devices in group
021     *
022     * @return All devices
023     */
024    T[] getAllDevices();
025
026    default List<T> getAllDeviceList() {
027        return Arrays.asList(getAllDevices());
028    }
029
030    /** Propogate actions across the followers
031     *
032     * @param value the value to propogate
033     */
034    default void propogate(double value) {}
035}
